Check if the geolocation.clearWatch() method of the first parameter can be set to empty

spec.spec_statement: The clearWatch() method takes one argument. When called, it must first check the value of the given watchId argument. If this value does not correspond to any previously started watch process, then the method must return immediately without taking any further action. Otherwise, the watch process identified by the watchId argument must be immediately stopped and no further callbacks must be invoked.
